thread.title: Boil order in effect after Carterville water main break
thread.title_full: Boil order in effect after Carterville water main break

author: BRANDYN WILCOXEN bwilcoxen@thesouthern.com
title: Boil order in effect after Carterville water main break
text:
CARTERVILLE — A boil water order is in effect in Carterville following a water main break early Wednesday morning.
Carterville Mayor Brad Robinson said he was notified of a main break in front of the fire station on North Division Street at around 2 a.m. Wednesday.
